title: Patria (A)
body: The first issue was published on April 2, 1862, and the thirteenth, which was the last, on July 2 of the same year. Another newspaper with the same name was published from April 25, 1906, to May 26, 1907, producing thirty-seven issues.

1862: Publication of the first issue of the newspaper A Pátria
1906: Publication of the newspaper A Pátria
